COMMITTEE ON THE JUDICIARY
March 1, 1967
Mr. Bernard O'Kelley
Dean, College of Arts and Sciences
The University of North Dakota
Grand Forks, North Dakota 58201
Dear Dean O'Kelley:
Thank you for letting me know your views on the edu¬
cational radio provisions which are expected to be in¬
cluded in a bill which Senator Magnuson will probably
introduce dealing with educational television facilities.
Mr. Myron Curry, whom you undoubtedly know, was here in
Washington and visited at length with one of my assistants
concerning the merits of this, and it is now being given
careful study. Again, thank you for your views which I
shall keep under consideration.
With kind regards, I am
Sincerely
Quentin N. Burdick
QNB:jmw
